description: Visit the Allwetterzoo to enjoy a variety of animals and exhibits, while experiencing a lovely day outdoors in mild weather.

locationInfo.description: Allwetterzoo Münster offers a great opportunity to walk through animal exhibits and natural landscapes, perfect for a longer visit with friends.
safetyTips: Stay hydrated while exploring the zoo.

description: Step back in time and explore the historic buildings and exhibits at the Mühlenhof Open-Air Museum, showcasing Münster’s heritage.

locationInfo.description: Explore the Mühlenhof Open-Air Museum, a space dedicated to displaying old houses, tools, and cultural history of the region.
safetyTips: Check the weather forecast before heading out.
Stay on the marked paths in the museum to ensure safety.

activity: Biking through the Havixbeck Nature Reserve
description: Rent bikes and explore the beautiful Havixbeck Nature Reserve, a scenic area perfect for cycling through forests and fields.

locationInfo.description: Cycle through the scenic routes of Havixbeck Nature Reserve, where you can enjoy the fresh air and view diverse wildlife and plants.
safetyTips: Carry a water bottle and snacks for the ride.

description: Spend a relaxing afternoon having a picnic by the Aasee Lake, enjoying the tranquil atmosphere and picturesque views.

locationInfo.description: Aasee is a popular spot for picnics, boating, and walking along the lake, offering a peaceful setting for group activities.
safetyTips: Bring sunscreen to protect from sun exposure.
Be mindful of local wildlife and avoid feeding animals.

description: Enjoy a nature hike through the Coesfelder Wald, a forested area perfect for walking and exploring nature trails with friends.

locationInfo.description: Explore the serene forest trails of Coesfelder Wald, ideal for a quiet walk or group hike surrounded by nature.
safetyTips: Wear sturdy shoes for walking on trails.
Carry a small first-aid kit and stay aware of your surroundings.
